bcbioSingleCell

Fetch Gene Expression Data

Fetch Gene Expression Data

fetchGeneData(object, ...)

# S4 method for seurat
fetchGeneData(object, genes)

Arguments

object

Object.
...

Additional arguments (for the S4 generic definition).
genes

Gene identifiers (matrix rownames).

Value

matrix.

Examples

load(system.file(
    file.path("extdata", "seurat.rda"),
    package = "bcbioSingleCell"))

# seurat
genes <- slot(seurat, "data") %>%
    rownames() %>%
    head()
fetchGeneData(seurat, genes = genes) %>%
    head()
#>                          SCYL3      CD99 TMEM176A   SLC4A1  SLC25A5    DHX33
#> M1_AAACACTA_CTTAGGTA 0.9584751 1.7618415 0.000000 2.505854 0.000000 1.761842
#> M1_AAACACTA_CTTCGATT 2.5202846 0.7125992 2.231549 1.124465 1.823972 0.000000
#> M1_AAACCGCC_GAGTTTCG 2.8227342 0.0000000 1.836456 1.836456 1.836456 0.000000
#> M1_AAACCGCC_TAGCCTCG 2.7106050 1.7368557 0.000000 0.000000 1.736856 2.337847
#> M1_AAACGATC_TTTACCCT 2.4129392 1.9601005 1.622688 1.109667 2.412939 3.060277
#> M1_AAACTACA_CCACATTA 2.2671086 2.1482704 1.857416 1.445576 2.148270 1.672549
